overview: She moves vigorously, clumsily, angry, in pain. The water has entered, she would like to stop it, she calculates its transit, covers the holes but everything begins to float, it vanishes before her eyes. He struggles, he clings but the water is denser now, although he would like to rescue his belongings, everything must be washed. The water keeps rising, she lets herself go.
title: Distantes EP 1: Fracaso
